name: Office, Time loop and The End of the World
name_original: Office, Time loop and The End of the World
description:
For some strange reason, it's better play without fullscreen mode. You can try, but you will most likely regret it.

(or try standalone version. it's only 27mb )

Story

It was a beautiful day. But something terrible happened! What happened and how to fix it is up to you to find out. You only have 10 seconds. The countdown starts now…

Controlls

Move: Arrows

Interact: Space
